description: Paper that studies the impact of non-standard limb-darkening laws in transit fitting. Published in MNRAS (Espinoza & Jordán, 2016, in press).
README.md:
# Limb-darkening: which law to use?

This repository stores the code used to generate the figures and text in 
Espinoza & Jordan (2016, MNRAS, in press). 

Link to the paper on arXiv: http://arxiv.org/abs/1601.05485
